message.entry: You cannot specify the ''{0}'' flag more than once.
You can specify either ''legacy'' or ''R2012a'' but not both.
The ''rows'' input is not supported for cell array inputs.
Input A of class {0} and input B of class {1} must be cell arrays of character vectors, unless one is a character vector.
Inputs A and B must have the same number of columns in the ''rows'' case.
Input A of class {0} and input B of class {1} must be the same class, unless one is double.
Inputs A and B must be matrices in the ''rows'' case.
A must be a numeric, logical or char array.
B must be a numeric, logical or char array.
A or B must be double when A and B have different numeric types.
The first and second input arguments must have the same type.
